title: The Machine Plays Cards (Person of Interest)( 2 x 1)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: Harold deliberately lost because it was a moral decision. I imagine it didn't feel right to him that he was using TM for personal gain even though he was running an experiment with TM's prediction capabilities.
One of the best scenes from the show. Harold teaching The Machine is probably my favourite part of it.
He made that decision on purpose because , he didnt need the money .
description:
Harold teaches the Machine on how to play cards.
